title: (x) Liberty Fitness logo casual italic sans - Mercurius {Evan Dunn}
content:
What font is used for this logo? The Liberty part only

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110318204324im_/http:/typophile.com/files/liberty_logo_5733.gif)
author: evan

comments.content:
Sanvito?

Nah, close but not it.
OK, just tried Bowfin's site and found it - Mercurius I think from the small sample there.

[Mercurius Medium Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20110318204324/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.873.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Liberty+Fitness&sampleSize=32), to be exact.

- Mike Yanega
